overview: A stop-motion animated/mixed-media tapestry of deathbed dreams, ghost stories, and metaphysical musings, framed within the boxing match of a life. Fifteen years in the making, itâ€™s a surreal blend of animation and live-action, exploring layers of a subconscious landscape where lost souls wander through luminous textures of memory, mystery, and wonder.
title: Tanglewood
